Member Function Documentation

void ThPipeWriter::Flush (  ) 

flushes any waiting data in the pipe. This should be called whenever data is to be sent off.

flush the pipe if there is data waiting in the current region.

Definition at line 180 of file ThPipeWriter.cpp.

public methods

resets the stream interface. Note that this does not do a flush.
